Detailed Description

Arguments for IOCTL_BSP_TVP5158_SET_VIDEO_NF.

Field Documentation

UInt32 Bsp_Tvp5158VideoNfParams::channelNum

Channel number for which these parameters are to be applied.

UInt32 Bsp_Tvp5158VideoNfParams::colorKillerEnable

TRUE: Reduce color when noise is HIGH, FALSE: Do not reduce color.

UInt32 Bsp_Tvp5158VideoNfParams::maxNoise

Max noise level.

UInt32 Bsp_Tvp5158VideoNfParams::nfEnable

TRUE: Noise filter ON, FALSE: Noise filter OFF.
